text: La Chapelle is a commune. It is in the Allier department in the center of France. This village in the Montagne Bourbonnaise area is part of the Vichy region. In the 2022 census, it had 396 residents. The people who live there are called Chapelois and Chapeloises, Chapellois or Chapelloises, or Chapelains and Chapelaines. ==References== *INSEE Category:Communes in Allier
title: La Chapelle, Allier
